Naturium Fermented Camellia Creamy Cleansing Oil

Brand: Naturium

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, GLYCERIN, AQUA, SUCROSE LAURATE, PSEUDOZYMA EPICOLA/CAMELLIA SINENSIS SEED OIL FERMENT EXTRACT FILTRATE, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, SALVIA HISPANICA SEED OIL, CAMELLIA OLEIFERA L

CAMELLIA OLEIFERA LEAF EXTRACT, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL EXTRACT, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, MELIA AZADIRACHTA EXTRACT, MORINGA OLEIFERA SEED OIL, PHENOXYETHANOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, TOCOPHEROL.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive
